profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Ariss Landscape Inc. is a passionate landscape design and construction company laser-focused on delivering the highest quality landscaping and outdoor spaces in southern Ontario. Attention to detail and a love for good-looking areas keep us always striving to add an attractive appeal to everything we build. 

We treat your home like it’s our own. We treat you like we would want a contractor to treat our family. It’s the right thing to do, and it’s good for long-term business success. 

We build our landscapes to last, and we build our landscapes to look beautiful. We want you to love your home and enjoy it. Having a designer on staff ensures that even if a project does not have a drawn-up and presented design, it will have an aesthetic appeal. Quality construction is at our core, and we build things to last. Period. 

We do everything possible to ensure a timely and efficient construction process. We keep our sites clean and politely interact with neighbors to walk them through what’s going on and the construction process.

Our Process:

1.	Call for an initial consultation
2.	Arrange an on-site meeting
3.	Receive a Quote with a few price options
4.	Watch us build your beautiful new space
5.	Enjoy!
name: Ariss Landscape Inc.

profile:
Welcome TC Contracting 

We offer many Services:

Retaining walls: TC Contracting are specialist in Armour stone, interlock and Pre cast concrete retaining walls.  Whether its aesthetic, or structural  needs, TC Contracting has the skills and knowledge to complete the task. Contact us with your ideas and watch us bring them to reality. 

Full Landscaping , Interlock, Concrete: We know you work hard to see your dream property come to reality. Here at TC, we will work with you to make sure the job is done properly and in a timely matter

Fencing: To dig and set post to complete fencing jobs. From 10 feet to a 1000 feet .  TC has the capabilities to finish your project. Many different fencing designs available, contact us to get started 
Decks: There are many options when it comes to decks IE: Wood type, railings, Steps, Levels ECT. Let TC Contracting's team help you figure out which options are suited best for you!  

Excavation and Trenching: Are you looking for a trusted contractor to excavate your next  project? There are many laws and regulations surrounding excavating and digging. Let us explain what needs to be done and leave it with TC so you are confident  that your job is being done right.  Each and every time!

Gravel Driveways and Sodding: Looking to give your property a beautiful new look? TC Contracting are experts at gravel driveways and sod. We work with our partners to guarantee the best materials at the best prices.
name: TC contracting

profile:
Have you worked with landscaping contractors before who rush through the job and leave a mess of your yard? Do you now struggle to trust someone to take care of your lawn?

We’re a team of dedicated landscaping professionals who are well-known for getting any landscaping project done right, the first time around. We’re passionate about helping homeowners and business owners reach their landscaping goals and we take pride in our ability to provide high-quality services at an affordable price.
Since opening our doors in 2018, we’ve been able to expand our service areas all thanks to our trusted customers who rely on us as their long-term landscaping partner. If you live in Rockwood, Guelph, or the KW area, give us a call or request a free quote to discuss all your landscaping needs and how we can help you accomplish them.

We offer services such as:
Design
Build
Maintenance
Snow Removal

And more!

Check us out here:

www.instagram.com/riverwood_landscape
https://www.facebook.com/RiverwoodLandscape/
